wikipedia_page.main: Reece Wabara (born 28 December 1991) is an English businessman and former professional footballer who played as a defender. He is also a former England U20 international.

Wildschut's first game after signing for the club on a permanent basis came on 12 January 2016, where he came on as a substitute in the second half, in a 3–3 draw against Sheffield United. As the 2015–16 season progressed towards the end of the season, Wildschut went on to score five more goals against Walsall, Colchester United, Shrewsbury Town and Blackpool (twice). After finishing the season, making thirty-eight appearances and scoring nine times in all competitions and helping them reach promotion to Championship, Wildschut was named in League One's PFA Team of the Year for his performances in the 2015–16 season, alongside teammates Craig Morgan, Reece Wabara and Will Grigg.
